nl.dormac.metatender.PRODUCT_DELETE_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}" permanently? All data regarding the product will be permanently deleted including all fabrication history and graphs. Alternatively you could deactivate the product instead, this way the information will still be available, but the product will not be displayed on the products page.
nl.dormac.metatender.PRODUCT_ACTIVE_HELP: When a product is deactivated it cannot be fabricated, and is hidden on the products screen.
nl.dormac.metatender.PICK_FINISHED_PRODUCT_FROM_MACHINE_FAILE: Picking finished product from machine has failed

When the pickup of a finished product from the machine fails the program will stop completely.
 You are now expected to investigate the situation and fix any problem.
 You are also expected to move the Cobot back to its home position before starting the program again.

nl.dormac.metatender.PATH_FROM_DRAWER_TO_OUTSIDE_MACHINE_DOOR: Path from drawer to outside machine door
nl.dormac.metatender.IO_MODE_HELP: The 'mode' determines what the Cobot will do: When input and output is selected the Cobot will pick up raw materials from the drawer and place them into the machine. When fabrication is finished the finished product is then picked up and placed on the drawer. When input is selected the Cobot will only place raw materials into the machine, but does not place the finished product back on the drawer When output is selected the Cobot will only pickup finished products from the machine and place them on the drawer, but does not insert raw materials into the machine.
nl.dormac.metatender.AIRPURGE_BEFORE_INFEED_HELP: When 'Air purge before infeed' is enabled the Cobot will, before placing the raw material into the machine, blow air against the machine claw to blow away any leftover materials.
nl.dormac.metatender.FORCE_INFEED_WITH_HELP:
When 'Force infeed with' is enabled the Cobot will push the raw material into the machine with some force.
 With this option you can make sure the raw material is placed completely against the back of he machine claw.
nl.dormac.metatender.PUSH_AFTER_PLACEMENT_WITH_HELP:
When 'Push after placement with' is enabled the Cobot will exert force against the raw material, the the Cobot will send a signal to the machine to open the claw. The raw material will then be pushed against the back of the machine,  next the Cobot will send a signal to the machine to close the claw.
 Use this option when 'Force infeed with' is not sufficient, since 'Push after placement with' takes more time.
nl.dormac.metatender.PUSH_WITH_CLOSED_GRIPPER_HELP: When 'Push with closed gripper' is enabled the Cobot will push with a closed gripper. Beware: make sure the diameter of the closed gripper is sufficient to push against the raw material! When pushing with a closed gripper you can often push the raw material a little further to the back of the machine.
nl.dormac.metatender.AIRPURGE_BEFORE_OUTFEED_HELP: When 'Air purge before outfeed' is enabled the Cobot will, before taking the finished product from the machine, blow air against the machine claw to blow away any leftover materials.
nl.dormac.metatender.AIRPURGE_AFTER_OUTFEED_HELP: When 'Air purge after outfeed' is enabled the Cobot will, after the finished product has been taken from the machine, blow air against the machine claw to blow away any leftover materials.
nl.dormac.metatender.CLEAN_PRODUCT_HELP:
When 'Clean product' is enabled the Cobot, after the finished product has been taken from the machine, the finished product will be taken to the configured cleaning position.
 Once there the cleaning cycle will be started.
nl.dormac.metatender.PLACE_FINISHED_PRODUCT_ON_SECOND_DRAWER: Place finished product on second drawer
nl.dormac.metatender.PLACE_FINISHED_PRODUCT_ON_SECOND_DRAWER_:
When 'Place finished product on second drawer' is enabled the Cobot will place the finished product on the second drawer instead of on the first drawer.
 The effect this has is that the first drawer can now be fully loaded: it is no longer necessary to place a single raw material on the first square when the raw material can be stacked. Without a second drawer it is necessary place one raw material on the first square so the first finished product can be placed back on the drawer.
nl.dormac.metatender.STEPPED_AXIS_HELP: When 'Stepped axis' is enabled the finished product has a stepped axis. Meaning that the finished product's height is not uniformly the same, but has differing height levels.
nl.dormac.metatender.TOP_OFFSET_HELP: The top offset depends on which axis the gripper is going to grab. When grabbing the first axis (green), the top offset is zero. When grabbing the second axis (gray) the top offset is the width of the first (green) axis.
nl.dormac.metatender.BOTTOM_OFFSET_HELP: The bottom offset depends on which axis the gripper is going to grab. When grabbing the third axis (purple), the bottom offset is zero. When grabbing the second axis (gray) the bottom offset is the width of the third (purple) axis.
nl.dormac.metatender.FIN_PRODUCT_HEIGHT_STEPPED_AXIS_HELP: The finished product height is the width of the green, gray and purple areas combined.
nl.dormac.metatender.PRODUCT_DOES_NOT_USE_SUB_SPINDLE: Product does not use sub spindle
nl.dormac.metatender.DRAWER_OFFSET_EXPLANATION: When placing the finished product on the drawer, or picking the raw material from the drawer. You can alter the pick / place position slightly by providing offsets.
nl.dormac.metatender.MACHINE_OFFSET_EXPLANATION: When picking the finished product from the machine, or placing the raw material into the machine. You can alter the pick / place position slightly by providing offset.
nl.dormac.metatender.STACK_AMOUNT_EXPLANATION: The amount of raw materials / finished products that can be stacked on top of each other.

nl.dormac.metatender.AMOUNT_SQUARES_Y_AXIS: Amount of cut out squares on Y axis
nl.dormac.metatender.MAINTENANCE_MODE_WARNING: Warning: place the Cobot outside of the machine on its home position, and clear the machine before starting maintenance!
nl.dormac.metatender.DROP_OFF_POSITION_DELETE_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to delete drop off position "{{name}}"?
nl.dormac.metatender.PATH_FROM_DROP_OFF_POSITION_TO_OUTSIDE_M: Path from drop off position to machine
nl.dormac.metatender.PLACE_FINISHED_PRODUCT_ON_DROP_OFF_POSIT: Place finished product on drop off position

When 'Place finished product on drop off position' is enabled the Cobot will place the finished products on the drop off position, instead of the drawer.
 The idea is that this drop off position points to a transporter track or a container / bin.
nl.dormac.metatender.BACKUP_EXPLANATION:
Backup allows you to back-up the MetaSuite application data.
 There are two options:
 1. Full backup: this exports the setup configuration, the products, the fabrication data, and historical configurations.
 2. Partial backup: this exports only the setup configuration and products. 
 The partial option is faster because it exports less data.
nl.dormac.metatender.RESTORE_BACKUP_EXPLANATION: Restore backup allows you to restore the Cobot to a previous state. Warning: when restoring a backup you will override all current data in the Cobot / database! This will cause you to lose the current setup configuration, all products, all fabrication data, and all historical configurations.
nl.dormac.metatender.INVALID_BACKUP_FORMAT_ERROR: Could not restore backup: file does not contain a valid backup json
nl.dormac.metatender.STATIC_GRID_DELETE_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to delete static grid "{{name}}"?
